configs Module¶

configs module combines is a main place for model configurations. These settings are separately defined in their related functions.

Categories of arguments¶

  • data

  • model

  • test

  • test_arg

  • log_arg

  • compute_arg

  • misc_arg

Default configurations for models¶

The config package contains base configurations for models:

farabi.core.configs._cfg_unet()[source]¶

Configurations for U-Net

farabi.core.configs._cfg_attunet()[source]¶

Configurations for Attention U-Net

farabi.core.configs._cfg_srgan()[source]¶

Configurations for SRGAN

Configurations for CycleGAN

farabi.core.configs._cfg_yolov3()[source]¶

Configurations for SRGAN

Configurations for Faster-RCNN
